acceptanceCommandTemplates().notice: Returns a hard-coded two-dimensional array of strings representing the command templates for an acceptance by a new guardian.

extractRecoveredAccountFromAcceptanceCom.notice: Extracts the hash of the account address to be recovered from the command parameters of acceptance email and returns the corresponding address stored in the accountHashes.

extractRecoveredAccountFromRecoveryComma.notice: Extracts the hash of the account address to be recovered from the command parameters of recovery email and returns the corresponding address stored in the accountHashes.

parseRecoveryDataHash(uint256,bytes[]).notice: parses the recovery data hash from the command params. The data hash is verified against later when recovery is executed

recoveryCommandTemplates().notice: Returns a hard-coded two-dimensional array of strings representing the command templates for email recovery.

storeAccountHash(address).notice: Stores the account hash in the accountHashes mapping

validateAcceptanceCommand(uint256,bytes[.notice: Validates the command params for an acceptance email

validateRecoveryCommand(uint256,bytes[]).notice: Validates the command params for an acceptance email
